feedback: The shape of the nuclear bomb clearly demonstrates craftsmanship
Taste is in the eye of the designer as well as the viewer.
There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to this media to imply that it is contrasting with other figures.
While there is a light source and a shadow cast, shading is a term used for pencil based sketching
Who would think of a colorful nuke?
The color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character
I don't think nukes are supposed to look like that man
